attorneys: W. T. Locke and J. Earle Kuntz, both of Wichita Falls, for appellant., Lloyd W. Davidson, State’s Atty., of Austin, for the State.

opinions.opinion_text:
LATTIMORE, Judge.
Conviction for misdemeanor theft; punishment, six months in the county jail.
This record is here without statement of facts or bills of exception. The affidavit and information, as well as the charge of the court and the judgment, are correct in form.
No error appearing, the judgment will be affirmed.

court_short_name: Court of Criminal Appeals of Texas
court_full_name: Court of Criminal Appeals of Texas
